title: Gmail-Mcp-Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for integrating Gmail in Claude Desktop, supporting natural language-driven email management and auto-authentication.
creator: GongRzhe

GMAIL_OAUTH_PATH.description: Path to the OAuth keys JSON file used for Gmail API authentication.
